mapper.select: select w.wishlist_no wishlistNo , w.user_no userNo , w.quantity , p.product_no productNo , p.brand , p.title , p.price , p.itemimg image , wo.wishlistoption_no wishlistoptionNo , wo.detailoption_no detailoptionNo , po.option_name optionName , od.detailoption_name detailoptionName from wishlist w , product p , product_option po , wishlist_option wo , option_detail od where w.product_no = p.product_no and w.wishlist_no = wo.wishlist_no and wo.detailoption_no = od.detailoption_no and po.option_no = od.option_no and w.user_no = #{userNo} order by wishlistNo
select c.event_no , c.event_name , c.event_date , u.user_no from calender c , users u where c.user_no = u.user_no and u.user_no = #{userNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO funding_product (funding_no, event_no, wishlist_no, user_no, product_no, percent, amount, funding_status, funding_date) VALUES (NULL, #{eventNo}, #{wishlistNo}, #{userNo}, #{productNo}, #{percent}, #{amount}, 'O', NOW())
mapper.delete: DELETE w.* FROM wishlist w JOIN funding_product fp ON w.wishlist_no = fp.wishlist_no WHERE fp.event_no = #{eventNo}
